title: Age Of Worldwide Monsters - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts
tags: Alternate World   Appearance Changes   Arrogant Characters   Battle Competition   Chuunibyou   Criminals   Dragons   Earth Invasion   Fairies   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gate to Another World   Hiding True Identity   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Skill Books   Spirit Advisor   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Survival   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: 灰碳里的猫
description: Humans wished for longevity, Earth, wished for longevity as well. When Earth was on the brink of destruction, the Will of Earth awakened. A Game App that connects the Reiki of another world was thus been born. A frustrated youth unintentionally entered this game and was drawn into a stage where 3 million criminals were embroiled in a massacre, what path would he take? “This one is a Black Belt 4th Dan. Please to exchange pointers with you.” A vicious criminal gave a bloodthirsty smile. “Wing Chun, Ip Man!” Lin Xiao Bei gave the most desperate brag he has done in his life. [Ding. Congratulations, your bragging is successful. Obtained the martial attainments of a Wing Chun Grandmaster]>
